entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a character in the story, specifically a witch who is questioning Snape. She is described as having a high color in her cheeks and her chest rising and falling rapidly.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character in the story, specifically a wizard who is being questioned by Bellatrix. He is described as smiling.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person mentioned in the story, specifically someone whose pocket Snape has lived in for years.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a character in the story, specifically someone who is still alive despite being at Snape's mercy for five years.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is a character in the story, specifically a witch who is sitting motionless behind Bellatrix. Her face is hidden in her hands.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a title mentioned in the story, specifically someone who has fallen and been reborn.

entities.name: philosopher's stone
entities.description: The Philosopher's Stone is an object mentioned in the story, specifically something that Snape stopped the Dark Lord from procuring.

entities.name: prophecy
entities.description: The prophecy is an object mentioned in the story, specifically something that was retrieved for the Dark Lord a few weeks ago.

relationships.description: Bellatrix is questioning Snape about his actions and whereabouts over the years.
Snape has been living in Dumbledore's pocket for years.
Snape stopped the Dark Lord from procuring the Philosopher's Stone.
Snape has had Harry Potter at his mercy for five years, but he is still alive.
